comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: I love the rave review! I wonder if Beryl, Sid and the Lyricals ever crossed tracks with this 'babe'...she performed at the Wentworth Cabaret for about 5-6 months in 1927 (and possibly longer for all we know)...a kind of Sydney version of Sally Bowles, maybe... [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/7363564150/] nla.gov.au/nla.news-article120536638 a 1923 Sydney Times item on opening night at the Wentworth Cabaret nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17265925 ...some bio info on Hannah Maclurkin (1861-1936), who ran the Wentworth Hotel at this time. trove.nla.gov.au/work/37437940?q=%22maclurcan%22&l-av... a pic of Hannah Maclurkin in her younger years. Per various digitised newspaper hits, she visited the US on a number of occasions...she was evidently impressed with US hotels.
